title: Best Bits with Morgan and Special Guest Scuba Steve: PART 1
itunes:title: Best Bits with Morgan and Special Guest Scuba Steve: PART 1
description:
The Best Bits podcast is now officially separated into two podcasts!! This part of the podcast is the version you all have been wanting as a stand-alone, Morgan and a guest having their in-depth conversations without any interruptions. In this podcast you’ll hear Morgan and Scuba Steve discuss the things they love to do with their personal time and the TV shows and movies they suggest watching. Scuba Steve shared a story about how his wife told him she was pregnant, and Morgan shared some Food World stories and geeked out over Superhero things.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
